short_summary: Request for Proposal for Digital DNA Amplification Device (dPCR)
description: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a digital DNA amplification device (dPCR)
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Reference

WS4163943696-Doc4164125665

### Solicitation Reference

WS4163943696

### Notice Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) to acquire a digital DNA amplification device (dPCR) for the Fisheries and Oceans Canada facility located in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Publication Date**: September 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 17, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* **Scope of Work**: Delivery and installation of a digital DNA amplification device (dPCR) including any necessary training and support services.
* **End Use Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **End Use Entity Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

Consult the notice URL for contact details and any additional information.

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17282858?extsite=MTcyODI4NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Annexes and Attachments

Annex A details the scope of work for the tender.

### Bidding Instructions

For more information on bidding instructions, please refer to the notice URL above. The bidding instructions may include specific requirements for bidders, the tender submissions process, and evaluation criteria. Revision History:
